thread.title: Bob and Nancy
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by Bob and Nancy

author: Bob and Nancy
title: Bob and Nancy
text: Shane is A travel expert who is very down to earth and just plain helpful. He responds to your calls and to your questions. He was able to upgrade us from what we thought was a nice place to an excellent newer location with a good number of additional perks. He is pleasant to talk with. We are thrilled he is at BlueSun Vacations and that he is the agent that helped us.
